list.abs: 米特拉达梯(Mithridates)是个波斯味道很浓的名字，意为太阳神密特拉(Mithra, 也叫密多罗)的儿子。密特拉是祆教最重要的神之一，公 …
敌人名称日中英对照表 - 最终幻想13 -... ... 潘那贾拉 Penanggalan 米多利达地司 Mithridates 毕托伊多斯 Bituitus.

means.word_mean: 1. ancient king of Pontus who expanded his kingdom by defeating the Romans but was later driven out by Pompey (132-63 BC)

auth_sentence.content: Mithridates was once more a petty Asiatic prince existing upon sufferance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mithridates was once more a petty Asiatic prince existing upon sufferance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mithridates was once more a petty Asiatic prince existing upon sufferance.
